keyEvents.title: Whitebeard vs Blackbeard Battle
keyEvents.description: The climactic battle between Whitebeard and Blackbeard takes place on the battlefield of Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most significant battles in the Summit War.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard's Declaration
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard declares that the One Piece is real, with his words echoing across Marineford and being broadcast to the world.
keyEvents.significance: This declaration shakes the world and reignites the Great Pirate Era.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Dies at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Edward Newgate dies standing on the battlefield of Marineford, marking the end of an era.
keyEvents.significance: The death of one of the Four Emperors at Marineford represents a turning point in world history.

description: Marine Headquarters, the main base of operations for the Marines in the first half of the Grand Line. The site of the Summit War where Whitebeard died.
significance: The center of Marine power and the location of the Summit War of Marineford, one of the most significant conflicts in One Piece history.
notes: After the events of the Marineford War, Marine Headquarters was relocated to the New World. Marineford itself was left in ruins after the battle.
